name: Dungeon Matrix
description:
Controls:

WASD- to move.

R- to restart level.

E- to pick up objects.

Shift- to sprint.

Ctrl- to crouch or crouch slide while moving.

Space- to jump, press twice to double jump.

F- Video Settings

===========================================================

Hardcore mode respawns the player at the first level no matter the death location.

===========================================================

Description:

Enter the Dungeon Matrix, an artificial realm which can only maintain stability for thirty seconds. Seek out the portal to avoid certain death within the time limit to survive.

Known Bugs:

-No audio on the 3rd level

-Jump Pads can launch in wrong directions

-Held objects can get stuck in walls

-(not really a bug)Third level is currently next to impossible in its current configuration.

===========================================================

FIXES WILL BE IMPLEMENTED SOON
